title: Dems Sweep Georgia, Insurrection Sweeps The Capitol 1.7.21
itunes:title: Dems Sweep Georgia, Insurrection Sweeps The Capitol 1.7.21
description:
In episode 786, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Vanessa Gritton to discuss Georgia exit polls, the capital being taken over by white terrorists, Fox News stand up, Kyle Jenner hand sanitizer, Kim and Kanye's divorce, Pizza Hut's stuffed crust pizza, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Exit Polls
  2. Updates: Capitol breached by protesters, woman shot inside
  3. Michael Loftus Live From Nashville
  4. Kylie Jenner hand sanitizer
  5. Kimye is Allegedly No More
  6. Pizza Hut Rings in the New Year with a Pizza-Less Stuffed Crust Ring
  7. Pizza Hut baffles customers with unusual new menu item: ‘How do you even eat that?’
  8. Meet The Woman Who Changed Pizza Forever By Stuffing The Crust With Cheese
  9. Pizza Hut Sued Over Stuffed Crust
  10. There's A Controversy Surrounding The Origins Of Pizza Hut's Famous 'Stuffed Crust'
  11. WATCH: Donald Trump | Stuffed Crust Pizza
  12. Yes, It Was Donald Trump Who First Introduced Pizza Hut’s Stuffed Crust to the World
  13. How Donald and Ivana Trump transformed Pizza Hut's stuffed-crust pizza into a multibillion-dollar business
  14. Pizza Hut’s stuffed crust pizza celebrates 25 years of gilding the lily
  15. PIZZA HUT IS SERVING SPAM STUFFED CRUST PIZZAS
  16. WATCH: Aquarian Dream - Yesterday (Was So Nice Today)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
